definition: to engage in wars of aggression at will (idiom)/militaristic/bellicose

sentences.english: All these motives have made me a passionate pacifist and anti militarist.
sentences.chinese: 这些动机使我变成强烈的和平主义者与反黩武主义者。

sentences.english: North Korea is quite probably the most militarized state on earth.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜或许是这个星球上最穷兵黩武的国家。

sentences.english: The gaels were a military and oppressive aristocracy .
sentences.chinese: 盖尔人是一个穷兵黩武，专横暴戾的贵族阶层。

not to worry/not to show concern
to rejoice in grandiose deeds/to strive to achieve extraordinary things
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces

non-Han tribes in the east and north of ancient China/barbarians

to go on or send a punitive expedition
